text:
I just love Sundays George,
nothing to do but play
I forgot Liz and  Johnny aren't home today
Mom, do you want to play?
We can ride bikes over Rainbow Bridge!
Sorry honey, I have a lot of laundry to do today
Dad, can we go sailing on a leaf boat today?
I bet the water is all sparkly!

I don't think I can. I have to finish this
article for the newspaper.
But it's Sunday
Sorry Abi, I have a deadline
Oh, OK

My parents are always so busy,
they never have time for me
I guess I could watch TV

George do you want to 
watch a cartoon with me?
George, a little help?
Look George! This tape has my name on it
I wonder what could be inside

Huh? I didn't know my dad knew how to
play the saxophone
I thought he justknew how to whistle
I have to get to the hospital!
Aw, what a cute little baby
Hello, Abi!
That's me?
I was so little, almost as little as you George
I just met you Abi, and you've already captured my heart
oh here you go

I know we're tired and exhausted all the
time but I don't think we've ever been happier
Every day she grows a little more and so does our love for her
I've got it
Abi
I finished my article
And the laundry is all done
Do you still wanna play?
Abi, how sweet
What's the big hug for?
For always being there, and giving me all the time you have
